body: @fapster101 Susuanpan made the plot (from his last works, it can be deduced that he's fond of green things voring women), but Runrun made the art. That's what keep everyone so dumbfounded seeing the tags, and the work.

Got to wonder. Is not showing the Alraune minions (what the Female MC got turned into at the end) faces deliberate....or do they have no eyes to begin with to illustrate their mere minions! (Leaving their original hair as a sort of signal that this "pitiful" lesser minion use to be a person, a pathetic female adventurer who failed to slay the Alraune, had her soul devoured and the remains of her body "recycled" for the creatures use....sort of like the fate of any poor fool who goes up against a Necromancer or those who know Necromancy and are killed! They're body raised and "Reforged as a Minion!")
Transformation Tag needs to be added
You don’t find stuff as good as this very often
From the cover it looked as if it was from Maltese runrun
